text:
:sparkles: *Hey Developers!* :sparkles: 

:new:We’re excited to introduce our new *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/feedback|Developer Feedback Tool>*, designed to gather in-depth insights from our developer community.:new:

Unlike the <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/idb-p/HubSpot_Ideas|Ideas Forum> or various pop-ups you may encounter on HubSpot, this is made _just for developers._ To support our developers, the tool focuses on getting detailed technical feedback about our APIs, SDKs, and development tools—allowing you to engage directly with the HubSpot team. There's also an option to opt in for follow-up conversations indicated on the form.

_Please note that this ‌form is only for feedback and shouldn't be used for specific questions or support._ 

Additionally, we’re working on a two-way update process scheduled to launch in the first half of 2025. This will offer more transparency about how your input influences HubSpot's future. :bulb:

*Ready to share?<https://developers.HubSpot.com/feedback| Check it out here!>*

—The HubSpot API Tooling and DevRel Teams
